Summary: high altitude cruising orb movind due east
divs: Sighting Detailsa storm front is moving in here so i was looking to the east and saw a sphere shaped object about 30000 ft in altitude moving due east very slowly. it appeared to release a smaller sphere which flew north east very fast. the object then dissapeared from sight
